front.title: A YANG Model for Application-aware Networking (APN)

abstract.t: Application-aware Networking (APN) is a framework, where APN data packets convey APN attribute (incl. APN ID and/or APN Parameters) to enable fine grained service provisioning. This document defines a YANG module for APN. The YANG modules in this document conform to the Network Management Datastore Architecture (NMDA).
